about_the_game:
ZZZZZAAAAAAPPPPPPP!!!!!!

You've found a retro style, 2D top-down action/adventure game in the vein of select retro-gaming archetypes.
Designed as a Couch style local co-op or solo campaign. NOTE: Two (2) controllers are required to play a local multiplayer game.
Weapons & Power-ups
Chose to upgrade your Systems with either more RED LIGHTNING or faster engine AND range of fire!! Overcome your enemies with tact and powerful weapons!
Minions & Bosses
Test your abilities against a wide selection of GROUND and AIR sworn enemies and engage in epic boss fights!
Challenge mode
Is the game too easy? Try HARD MODE!!!
